name: Age of Cells
description:
Cell Based 2d Shooter fighting fast duplicating Viruses

You are a brave T-Helper-Cell - which has to Defend her Home-Organism against a spreading Virus Infection. Your only weapons are Antigens which you can fire using the right mouse button.

Use your left mouse button to navigate your T Helper Cell by clicking on the position, you want it to move.

But watch out, every 10 seconds the viruses will replicate. Don’t let them spread to wide.
